title: Asep in action: the student (TEFC)
brief_description: Shows students using the unit “Plants” in the classroom and on an excursion, emphasizing the practical aspects of A.S.E.P. courses, whilst participating in excursions, they discus teacher/student relationships, and their feelings about group work and electives.
